issue.title: [R] Refactor the difftime() and as.diffime() bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16418](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16418). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-16060 is solved and these 2 functions have high cyclomatic complexity
